title: Vignette next to "The Language of Form and Color" ("Formen- und Farbensprache") (headpiece, page 43) from Über das Geistige in der Kunst (Concerning the Spiritual in Art)
medium: Woodcut from an illustrated book with eleven woodcuts
dimensions: composition (irreg.): 4 5/8 x 15/16" (11.8 x 2.4 cm); page: 8 1/4 x 7 1/16" (21 x 18 cm)
